resources.string: Welcome to "High-Low"! \n Press "Play" to start \n a new Game!

Rules for HIgh Low \n\n To play the game you need to guess if a card is higher, lower or equal to the previous one. You can guess wrong 10 times during a round, if you guess wrong the eleventh time the game is over. If you make it through a whole round, you will get two new lives added.
